author: andschwa
body: Per #1546, we have lots of duplicated documentation about submodules, as once upon a time we had to actively work with them. We're now at the point that most developers will never modify a submodule, and we should a) investigate removing both remaining submodules (subtree, break dependency, grab binary, etc.) and b) reconcile our submodule documentation.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
For Pester, I would prefer to keep it as a submodule. We should be able to replace it by upstream one at some point, no need to have this files in the history.

For googletests I like the submodule, again, because the history is cleaner.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Sounds like we'll just leave the submodules as-is, and need to clean up docs.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I'm going to close this; it appears that submodules may be coming back so documentation updates should be handled by those making the changes.

title: Reconcile submodule documentation
